GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.17.2
GSD.description:
ubi: Fix race condition between ctrl_cdev_ioctl and ubi_cdev_ioctl

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 5f9e9c223e48c264241d2f34d0bfc29e5fcb5c1b, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 714fb87e8bc05ff78255afc0dca981e8c5242785. For more details please see the references link.
